title: Add Scripter component with AI chat interface

requirements.summary: Create a new Scripter component that provides a chat interface where users can describe the scripts they want the AI to generate for them
acceptanceCriteria: A new Scripter component exists with a chat-style interface similar to TranslatorChat and ArtCanvas
The component includes a text input area where users can describe what script they want
The component displays a conversation history of user requests and AI-generated script responses
The chat interface follows the existing dark theme design patterns used in other components

file_operations.description: Create a new Scripter component with a chat-style interface for script generation. The component should include a conversation history display area showing user requests and AI-generated code responses, a text input area with a submit button for describing script requirements, loading states during generation, and dark theme styling consistent with TranslatorChat and ArtCanvas. Follow the existing component architecture patterns used in TranslatorChat.tsx and ArtCanvas.tsx.

Create a custom hook for handling script generation logic. The hook should accept user script descriptions, simulate AI processing with appropriate delays (similar to useTranslation.ts patterns), generate mock code/script responses based on common programming patterns and user input keywords, manage loading states, and return formatted script responses. This hook provides the core script generation capability for the Scripter component.

requirements.summary: Add the Scripter component as a new tab in the main application interface alongside the existing tabs
acceptanceCriteria: A new 'Scripter' tab appears in the tab navigation in App.tsx
Clicking the Scripter tab displays the Scripter component
The tab ordering and styling is consistent with existing tabs

file_operations.description: Add a new 'Scripter' tab to the tab navigation alongside existing tabs (Chat, Math Solver, Media Gallery, Translator, Music Generator, Art). Import the Scripter component and add it to the tabs array with appropriate label and content. Ensure the tab styling and ordering matches the existing tab pattern. Position the Scripter tab logically within the existing tab sequence.

requirements.summary: Implement AI script generation functionality in the Scripter component that processes user script requests and generates code or script output based on the description
acceptanceCriteria: When a user submits a script request, the component generates a simulated code/script response
The generated script is displayed in the chat history with appropriate formatting (code blocks, syntax highlighting if possible)
The script generation process shows a loading state while processing

file_operations.description: Integrate the useScriptGeneration hook into the Scripter component to process user script requests. Add message submission handling that calls the script generation hook, display loading states with appropriate UI indicators during generation, and render generated scripts in the chat history with code block formatting using <pre> and <code> tags with monospace font and proper indentation. Apply dark theme styling to code blocks for readability. Ensure the chat history scrolls to show new responses.
